data.actual_result: The place where the red text sat, goes empty and the place isn't covered by the email or the password field.
data.expected_result: There's no padding below the text.
data.short_description: When login fails because of any reason such as "New login location detected", no email entered, etc., and when the login is successfully completed, there's a padding below the email field.
data.steps_to_repro: - Logout. - Clear your email. - Hit login. - Now, enter your correct email and password. - Hit login.
